text.text:
Nakon ≈°to nam je ova ponuda predstavljena, na pla≈æi, nismo dugo razmi≈°ljali o njoj!
Drago nam je da smo donijeli ovu odluku i tako imali nezaboravno putovanje!
Tim vrlo ljubaznih, mladih i struƒçnih ljudi!

originalText.text:
After this offer was presented to us, on the beach, we didn't spend much time thinking about it!
We are glad that we made this decision and thus had an unforgettable trip!
A team of very kind, young and professional people!
I can only recommend with great confidence!

text.text:
Vidjeli smo telefonski broj na papiriƒáima na pla≈æi i putem WhatsAppa rezervirali turu za sljedeƒái dan. Krenuli smo iz Bibinja i mogli smo promijeniti redoslijed zaustavljanja prema na≈°im ≈æeljama te odrediti trajanje na pojedinim odredi≈°tima unutar 5 sati.
Na≈° vozaƒç je bio jako ljubazan i obilazak je bio apsolutno vrijedan novca! Bilo nam je jako lijepo.

originalText.text:
We saw the phone number on pieces of paper on the beach and booked our tour for the following day via WhatsApp. We started from Bibinje and were able to change the order of the stops according to our wishes and also determine the duration at the individual destinations within the 5 hours.
Our driver was very nice and the tour was absolutely worth the money! We had a very nice time.

text.text:
Nezaboravan dan, hvala!
Ivan je sjajan kapetan, organizacija i informiranost su besprijekorni. üòÉ

originalText.text:
An unforgettable day, thank you!
Ivan is a great captain, the organization and information are flawless.

text.text: Vrlo lijep izlet brodom, sve je bilo apsolutno prekrasno. Svakako preporuƒçujem ako tra≈æite privatniji izlet brodom. Sva 3 zaustavljanja bila su sjajna. Mo≈æemo preporuƒçiti da ponesete naoƒçale za plivanje i mo≈æda vodootpornu masku za telefon ‚úåüèª

originalText.text: Very nice boat trip, everything was absolutely beautiful. Definitely recommend if your are looking for a more private boat trip. All 3 stops were awesome. Can recommend bringing swimming goggles and maybe water protected phone case ‚úåüèª

text.text:
Super lijepa i opu≈°tena tura.
Bilo je reklama na pla≈æi i onda smo to rezervirali putem WhatsAppa. Glatko trƒçanje. Sve savr≈°eno.
Sjajan i ljubazan tim.
Ponovno bismo rezervirali u bilo kojem trenutku.

originalText.text:
Super nice and relaxed tour.
There was advertising on the beach and we then booked it via WhatsApp. Smooth running. Everything perfect.
Great and friendly team.
We would book again at any time.
